sentences.sentence: Jordan's ancient city of Petra staged folk dances and pageants to highlight its charms.
sentences.translation: 约旦古城佩特拉(Petra)也将民间舞蹈和盛装表演搬上了舞台，借以凸显其迷人的魅力。
